mapper.update: UPDATE t_consume_record SET user_id = #{userId}, status = #{status}, consume_date = #{consumeDate}, create_date= #{createDate}, consume_money = #{consumeMoney}, update_date = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_consume_record (id, user_id, status, consume_date, consume_money,create_date) VALUES (#{id},#{userId},0,#{consumeDate},#{consumeMoney},NOW())
mapper.delete: UPDATE t_consume_record SET status=1, update_date=NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT record.id, record.status, record.user_id, record.consume_money, record.consume_date, record.create_date, record.update_date, tuser.user_name as userName, tuser.mobile as mobile FROM t_consume_record record LEFT JOIN t_user tuser ON tuser.id= record.user_id WHERE status=0 AND record.user_id=#{userId}
